articles.content:
Back in November, we saw a TENAA listing for what is widely believed to be the Redmi Note 10 and now the Pro variant has surfaced in an FCC document.

articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.title: Remember Vaio? Iconic PC brand eyes India again but with a different partner - The Indian Express
articles.description: Laptops have become quite predictable, and if Vaio wants to reinvigorate the market, it needs to make them exciting again.
articles.content: The Vaio laptop is making a comeback in 2021, but with a different partner. Nexstgo the company which brought Avitas laptops to India has a license agreement with the Japan-based VAIO Corporation to … [+4286 chars]

articles.title: Asus ZenFone 6 getting Android 11 update worldwide - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Two days after the Android 11 rollout for the ZenFone 6 in Taiwan, Asus is rolling out the update for the Global and European units.
articles.content: Since 2018, Asus changed the software implementation of its devices by ditching the bloated ZenUI in favor of a stock-ish Android ROM. This proves to be a successful strategy when it coming to keepin… [+2348 chars]
